```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
evals_prof_p2 <- read_excel("data/evals_prof_p2.xlsx")

prof_evals <- evals_prof_p2 %>%
  mutate(total = `Agree strongly` + Agree + `Agree Somewhat` + Neutral + `Disagree Somewhat` + Disagree + `Disagree Strongly`,
         meanscore = 7 * `Agree strongly` / total + 6 * Agree / total +
           5 * `Agree Somewhat` / total + 4 * Neutral / total +
           3 * `Disagree Somewhat` / total + 2 * `Disagree` / total + 
           1 * `Disagree Strongly` / total)

prof_evals
```
